## QGIS Resources

A few notable QGIS resources in the world:

* The [QGIS Training Manual](https://docs.qgis.org/2.14/en/docs/training_manual/)
* [A Gentle Introduction to GIS](https://docs.qgis.org/2.14/en/docs/gentle_gis_introduction/index.html)
* The [University of Waterloo QGIS Guide](https://uwaterloo.ca/library/geospatial/sites/ca.library.geospatial/files/uploads/files/creating_maps_in_qgis_tutorial_2014-wip_1.pdf)
* [GIS Stack Exchange](https://gis.stackexchange.com/questions/tagged/qgis)

...and many more that you can find by searching for specific help.
